directions: Combine the cabbage and carrot in a large bowl. In another bowl, combine all the remaining ingredients except the parsley, then toss well with the cabbage mixture. Cover and chill for at least 4 hours. Fold in the parsley just before serving.
ingredients: 1 cabbage (tough outer leaves removed), cored and slivered
Salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
title: Ginger Slaw
